page.title: 05A DAY IN CLASS 1W
page.content: When the whistle went we ran inside and took our coats off. We took our bags to the classroom in case anything got stolen. We talked until teacher came, then had to get our books out. We had register then Mr. Wright told us what was going to happen that day. At assembly we had a story, prayers and club notices. Then we did various bits of work. We did graphs. It was fun. At playtime some of us grabbed a bat and ball and played cricket. Then it was back to work. At midday we all stampeded downstairs and rushed to get our bags. We ate dinner quickly to get out to play. Some of us played cricket. The others won but we didn't care. We did poetry, model making and music in the afternoon. After playtime Mr. Wright read us a story and we drew a picture. At hometime we put our chairs up, said goodbye and ran home.
